articles.title: US Sikh Leader Alleges Republican Colleagues Attacking Her Over Religion - NDTV
articles.description: Harmeet Dhillon, a prominent Indian-American attorney who is running for Republican National Committee (RNC) chairwoman, has alleged that she is facing bigoted attacks from her fellow party leaders because of her Sikh faith.
articles.content:
Harmeet Dhillon is running for Republican National Committee (RNC) chairwoman. (File)

articles.author: Katherine Shaver
articles.title: Federal officials investigate near miss of two planes on JFK runway - The Washington Post
articles.description: A Delta Airlines flight preparing for takeoff at JFK airport stopped about 1,000 feet from where an American Airlines jet was crossing the runway, officials said
articles.content:
Comment on this story
